author: leif
msg: Work around a problem where maven is not able to handle redirects to mirror servers when downloading dependencies.  See: http://blogs.atlassian.com/developer/2006/12/maven_1_repository_changes.html

author: leif
msg: Make it possible to send smtp mails to servers which require authentication and use TLS.  This makes it possible to send to gmail servers.

author: shalin
msg: SOLR-700 -- Allow configurable locales through a locale attribute in fields for NumberFormatTransformer.
